scripts.backend:dev: cd backend && cross-env PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 pipenv run flask run --debug --cert=adhoc --host=0.0.0.0
scripts.backend:prod: cd backend && cross-env FLASK_ENV=production pipenv run gunicorn --workers 4 --bind 0.0.0.0:5052 "app:create_app()"
scripts.frontend: cd frontend && cross-env DEBUG=http-proxy-middleware* npm start
scripts.sync:db: wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:3316 && echo 'Tunnel connected, syncing DB...' && cd backend && pipenv run flask sync-db
scripts.prod: npm run build-frontend && npm run backend:prod
